description: Follow live text commentary, score updates and match stats from Augsburg vs Freiburg in the Bundesliga
title: Augsburg vs Freiburg: Bundesliga stats & head-to-head
title_page: Augsburg vs Freiburg: Bundesliga stats & head-to-head - BBC Sport
maintext:
Full Time
Second Half ends, FC Augsburg 0, SC Freiburg 0.
Post
Steve Mounié (FC Augsburg) hits the left post with a right footed shot from the centre of the box. Assisted by Arne Maier.
Post
Fourth official has announced 3 minutes of added time.
Post
Attempt missed. Matthias Ginter (SC Freiburg) header from the centre of the box misses to the left. Assisted by Christian Günter with a cross.
Post
Ritsu Doan (SC Freiburg) wins a free kick on the right wing.
Post
Matthias Ginter (SC Freiburg) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Booking
Kiliann Sildillia (SC Freiburg) is shown the yellow card for a bad foul.
Post
Steve Mounié (FC Augsburg) wins a free kick on the left wing.
